thread.title: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan on a publicity blitzkrieg
thread.title_full: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan on a publicity blitzkrieg - Entertainment

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan on a publicity blitzkrieg
text:
Diwali is around the corner and stars already have their diary full.

Salman Khan 

Sonam Kapoor 

Shamita Shetty 
Sonam Kapoor and Salman Khan, looking all ethnic in Indian wear, did a special performance for a popular channel's Diwali episode 'Prem Ki Diwali'..

Anita Hassanandani 
The special programme will also include performances by Anita Hassanandani, Shamita Shetty and Akshat Singh.

Raghav Juyal 

Karishma Tanna 

Akshat Singh. Pics/Yogen Shah
